DataElement.preferredName: Tooth Surgical Procedure Yes or No Response
DataElement.preferredDefinition: is an organ, the organ parts of which primarily consist of dentine and dental enamel; together with other teeth it constitutes a subdivision of the facial skeleton. ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: is an organ, the organ parts of which primarily consist of dentine and dental enamel; together with other teeth it constitutes a subdivision of the facial skeleton. Example(s): incisor, molar.

Concepts.definition: The hard bonelike structures in the jaws of vertebrates; primarily used for eating.
